area: For Coastal areas up to 60 nautical miles from Lerwick, Shetland (18)
warning: Low centred north of Shetland Waters at the start of the period, slowly moving north or northeast on Monday with frontal trough clearing.

forecast.wind: Cyclonic 3 to 5, becoming west or northwest 3 or 4, veering north later.
forecast.weather: Rain then showers, some fog patches at first.
forecast.visibility: Moderate or poor, occasionally very poor at first. Becoming good.
